dillon.gameAPI.gui

Class BlackoutImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.gui.BlackoutImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GuiComponent

    public class BlackoutImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements GuiComponent
    This is a replacement for the old gui system's blackout method using an image.
    Since:
    1.11
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
